categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: This mission occurred during the Galactic Civil War when Rebel pilot Wedge Antilles and a Rebel agent were sent to the asteroid Skip 52, located in the Smuggler's Run asteroid field, to recover a lost shipment of ryll spice. After a fight to the death with Imperial stormtroopers and Imperial Security Bureau operatives, the two Rebels succeeded in recovering the shipment.
